name: flipper
content:
flipper noun [C]
(PART OF CREATURE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
one of two parts like arms on the bodies of some sea creatures, such as seals and penguins, used for swimming
ChristianHütter/imageBROKER/GettyImages

flipper noun [C]
(SHOE)
(US also fin) a type of large, flat rubber shoe used for swimming, especially underwater
Nerthuz/iStock/GettyImagesPlus/GettyImages

Swimming
Add to word list
Add to word list
a part similar to an arm used for swimming by any of various sea animals, such as seals and penguins
A flipper is also a long, wide rubber shoe used for swimming.
